patterns.name: Standard_Stride
patterns.description: Low bass note on beats 1 and 3, chord in middle register on beats 2 and 4

patterns.name: Walking_Bass
patterns.description: Moving bass line with chord on offbeats

piano.name: Freddie_Green_Style
piano.description: Chord on every beat, minimal movement

techniques.name: Arpeggiated_Chords
techniques.description: Rolling chords rather than block chords

techniques.name: Pedal_Point
techniques.description: Sustained bass note under changing harmony

positions.name: Open_Position_Licks
positions.description: Uses open strings, common in bluegrass

positions.name: Telecaster_Licks
positions.description: Bright, twangy, often on high strings

common_techniques.name: Phase_Shifting
common_techniques.description: Repeating pattern at slightly different tempo
